data.route_analysis: Direct flights from major cities, local transport via buses and shuttles.
data.seasonal_patterns: In winter, tourists tend to flock to cultural events and festival celebrations.
data.climate: Temperatures range from 10°C to 25°C, with dry and sunny days ideal for exploration.
data.culture: Rich Mayan heritage, vibrant festivals such as Día de los Muertos. Attractions include ancient ruins and colonial towns.
data.attractions: Tikal National Park, Lake Atitlán, Antigua, and the volcanoes.
